actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A concurrent resolution to provide for an adjournment of the Senate from June 25, 1981 or June 26, 1981 to July 8, 1981, and an adjournment of the House from June 26, 1981 to July 8, 1981.

summary.text: Provides for an adjournment of the Senate from June 25 or June 26, 1981 to July 8, 1981, and an adjournment of the House of Representatives from June 26, 1981 to July 8, 1981.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution to provide for an adjournment of the Senate from June 25, 1981 or June 26, 1981 to July 8, 1981, and an adjournment of the House from June 26, 1981 to July 8, 1981.
